DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether suture use Device `` Leukosan Skinlink '' faster safer `` nylon '' treatment simple wound ED patient .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Skinlink With Suture ED Patients
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion age 1875 year , presence partial thickness laceration , generally good health without systemic abnormality , agreement return 14day followup , write informed consent . The exclusion criterion previous diagnosis diabetes mellitus , peripheral vascular disease , bleed disorder ; history keloid formation scar hypertrophy ; allergy cyanoacrylate compound formaldehyde
